page.title: 14MARTON HALL'S DAILY ROUTINE
page.content: The children get up at 7.30 and do a mile run up and down the drive at the school. After this they go for their breakfast which is at 8. At 9 theyt have lessons till 1 which are followed by lunch until 2. After lunch there are lessons again until 3.10. The next 2 hours are taken up by games. The children have a choice including cricket, football and rugby. Tea time is from 6-6. This is followed by prep which is like homework. The rest of the evening is free time when the children can choose an activity. They can go swimming, play tennis, bowls or croquet. Then at 9 they go to bed.
